html:
Pebble Beach, what else can one say that has not been said before. What a beautiful piece of property. But more then that is the welcome you get from the time to check into your hotel to the cleaning of your shoes when you are done. You will most likely fly into San Fransico and either drive down the 101, or if you have more time, take the more scenic State Route 1. Then on to 17 Mile Drive, where you will find views and find eight courses, including the famous Cypress Point.
The first thing I noticed was how soft the fairways where. It felt like you were walking on carpet.The course is not challenging by any means if you can hit the fairways. The challenge is the size and speed of the greens. Even after a bad shot, you will find yourself at peace with the views from the shore. Number 3 is a fun hole to see how much you would like to cut off. 6 is fun as it looks on TV. The par 3 seven is majestic as you would imagine. Eights second shot will make your knees knock. The next two holes along the ocean are lovely as long as you don't put the big right miss into play. You will be in a little of a daze as you get around the loop to 18. Then when it is over, you will ride back to the pro shop, have them clean your shoes, and have memories that will last a lifetime.
css: .container picture img {border-width: 7px;border-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);border-style: solid;filter: drop-shadow(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) 0px 2px 4px);}.container {display: grid;grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);grid-template-rows: 240px;font-size: 1.25rem;}.img1 {grid-column: 2/4;grid-row: 1/3;}.img2 {grid-column: 3/5;grid-row: 2/4;}.intro {visibility: hidden;opacity: 0;transition: opacity 1s ease-in-out;grid-column: 2/3;grid-row: 3/4;color: white;}.intro::first-letter {color: #903;float: left;font-family: 'Parisienne', cursive;font-size: 75px;line-height: 60px;padding-top: 4px;padding-right: 8px;padding-left: 3px;}.hero img {display: block;border-width: 0px;border-radius: 0px;filter: drop-shadow(rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) 0px 2px 13px);}.hero {display: flex;justify-content: center;margin-bottom: 16px;}.show {visibility: visible;opacity: 1;}img{width: 98%;}.hero picture img{width: 100%;}.white {background-color: white;color: black;}.text2{padding: 14px 4px;}@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {.intro{font-size: .75rem;grid-column: 1/2;}.container {grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);grid-template-rows: 92px;padding: 0 8px;}.img1 {grid-column: 1/3;grid-row: 1/3;}.img2 {grid-column: 2/4;grid-row: 2/4;}img {width: 226px;}.hero picture img{width: 100%;}.text2{padding: 14px 4px;}}
